code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with Body Aches for 7 weeks. she has a history of Rheumatoid Arthritis for past 5 years. she is a white f aged 74 yrs. o:Height 69 in, Weight 128 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ibuprofen - 800 mg up to 3x day, and ordered ESR.

s:patient complains of Heart. pt is a 75 year old white f. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 69 in, Weight 128 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Tachycardia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg daily, and ordered ECG.

content2.Unmatched: her life she denies drinking alcohol

td.content: s:a 75 year old F presents with Heart for 7 days. o:Height 70 in, Weight 129 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Tachycardia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg daily, and ordered ECG.

s:a female retired aged 76 ys presents with 2 days history of worsening Body Aches. o:Height 70 in, Weight 129 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ibuprofen - 800 mg up to 3x day, and ordered ESR.
